Package edu.vanier.selfdriving.controllers

Class CarController

java.lang.Object
edu.vanier.selfdriving.controllers.CarController
public class CarController extends Object
Class that controls and updates all Car object properties such as their movement, sensors, collisions, etc.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CarController()
    Creates an empty CarController object.
    CarController(ArrayList<Car> cars, ArrayList<Car> enemyCars, boolean userControlled)
    Creates a CarController with a list of cars and enemyCars, initializes movement for the car based on userControlled.

  • Constructor Details

    • CarController

      public CarController()
      Creates an empty CarController object.

    • CarController

      public CarController(ArrayList<Car> cars, ArrayList<Car> enemyCars, boolean userControlled)
      Creates a CarController with a list of cars and enemyCars, initializes movement for the car based on userControlled.
      Parameters:
      cars -
      enemyCars -
      userControlled - True if we want to control car with keyboard inputs. False if we want to control car with a neural network.
